lines: veena ek naye parivesh mein pahunch chukee thee
sab kuchh usake lie badalaasa lag raha tha
use laga tha har ek chehara ajanabee lekin man mein meetheesee tarange raharahakar uth rahee theen
is naepan ka ehasaas use bheetar hee bheetar ukasa raha tha khushakhush rahane ko
ajanabee cheharon kee chhedachhaad use gudaguda rahee thee
iseelie peechhe chhod aaee maanbahanon kee yaad use duhkhee nahin kar rahee thee
man hee man use dev kee maan apanee maan jaisee lag rahee thee usake bhaeebahan apanon se adhik apane lag rahe the
aaj ek naee padavee milee thee use kisee kee patnee kisee kee bahoo kisee kee bhaabhee kahalaane ka svapn saakaar hua tha usaka
apane ghar ka sapana tha usaka
chhotaasa ghar
padh likh jaane ke baad kuchh aage kee jab vah sochatee thee to use dikhata tha ek dulhan ka roop
svayan ko dulhan bane dekhane kee tamanna thee usakee
koee sundarasajeela naujavaan dikh jaata tha use kabheekabhee sapanon mein bas isase aage kuchh nahin
baarabaar apanee kalpana ko saakaar roop mein dekhane kee tamanna hotee thee use
lekin apane manobhaavon ko vah seedhesaadhe shabdon mein vyakt na kar paatee thee
bas kisee aur tasveer kisee aur kee baaten hotee theen bahanon mein sakhiyon mein
lekin manabhaavan chehara use dikha bahut samay ke baad
dev ko dekhakar use laga tha ki aise hee kisee var ko talaash rahee thee vaastavik jeevan mein usakee aankhen
pahalee baar dev ko dekhate hee usane apane man kee kaalpanik chhavi ko rangaroop se chitrit kar dev ka roop de diya tha
usakee kalpana rang mein aa gaee thee
dev ke aa jaane ke baad
aur aaj vah dev kee hokar usake ghar chalee aaee thee apane sapanon ko saakaar karane
raat der tak ghar bhar kee auraton ne use gher rakha tha
sab apaneapane tareeke se usase baaten kah rahee theen
aur veena bhee jahaan tak usase ho pa raha tha sabhee ko sunasamajhane kee cheshta kar rahee thee
ukataahat mahasoos karatee jab kabhee tab amit door kar deta usakee ukataahat use chaay pilaakar
use amit ka svabhaav bahut achchha laga tha
mahasoos kiya tha usane ki amit hee ghar mein sabase jyaada khushadil hai
itana to jaanatee thee ki ghar mein sabase chhota hai aur milanasaar hai
ab mahasoos kar rahee thee ki usakee khushadilee se oopar ek baat aur hai ki ghar bhar ke logon kee jarooraton ka bhee use hee dhyaan hai
dopahar baad deharaadoon se dillee pahunchane ke baad use amit andarabaahar hota dikhaee diya
kabhee kuchh laata hua aur kabhee kuchh le jaata hua
maan pita bhaeebhaabheeyaan sabhee use hee aavaaz de rahe the
jaise ghar mein amit kee hee chalatee ho
aur itanee vyastata ke baavajood amit ka veena ke paas aana aur chaay ke lie baarabaar poochhana veena ko bahut achchha laga tha
ab amit aaya to raat ke saadhe nau baj rahe the
is samay veena ke paas keval komal baithee thee
veena bhee amit se ab kaaphee khul kar baat kar rahee thee
amit ko dekhakar komal ne muskuraakar kaha  lo aa gaya phir tumhaara devar
kyon aapaka kuchh nahin kya  amit ne tunak kar poochha komal se
bhee mere lie tumhaara naata naya to nahin veena ke lie to tum pahalee baar bane ho devar
komal ne chutakee lee
theek hai theek hai ab aap pind chhudaana chaahatee hain na mujhase
bhee main sabaka devar hoon
sabase chhota sabhee ka sevak
tab komal ne baat ka rukh badala  chalo bhaee maan liya mere pyaare devar jee ab aap kahie kaise aana hua kya seva karenge ab aap hamaaree
haan yah huee na baat
khush hua amit aur bola  chalie ab khaana lag chuka hai
vaah dekho veena
kitana dhyaan rakhata hai sabaka amit
aur veena ne prashansaabharee najaron se dekha amit ko
use laga saamane amit nahin prem khada hai
prem bhee to aisa hee hai
veena ke man mein amit prem ke saath jud gaya ek chhote bhaee kee tarah
rishton kee shurooaat aise hee hotee hai meetheemeethee baaton ke saath
do aatmaon ka milan ekaek thahar gaya
veena kee drshti dev ke pet ke baen bhaag kee or padee
vahaan do inch chauda ek tep laga hua tha
apanee bikharee saanson ko kaaboo karane kee koshish karate hue usane poochha  yah kya hai
koee chot lagee hai kya
yah sunakar dev chaunka
nahin
yahee to hai
yah kya  main samajhee nahin
veena ko dev ke shabd pahelee se kam nahin lage
yah sunakar dev kuchh sambhal gaya
prem ka nasha jaise ekaek utar gaya usaka
vah veena ke pahaloo se hat kar uth gaya
kuchh pareshaan ho utha
tum jaanatee to ho mere opareshan ke vishay mein  dev ne spasht karane kee cheshta kee
opareshan kaunasa opareshan  veena hataprabh thee
kaisee baat kar rahee ho veena shaadee ke vigyaapan mein diya tha phir ramesh bhaee ne sab bataaya tha daidee ko
dev kee pareshaanee badh gaee ekaek
mujhe nahin maaloom dev
tum kaisee baat kar rahe ho
opareshan kaunasa  veena sach mein bhoolasee gaee thee opareshan shabd ko jo usane akhabaar mein hee padha tha
haan use aisa kuchh yaad nahin aaya ki kabhee ramesh bhaee ne kuchh aisa kaha tha usase ya daidee se
ya kuchh aisa likha tha
aisee baat tum kaise bhool rahee ho vigyaapan mein saaph likha tha
tab jaise yaad aaya veena ko
use vigyaapan mein likhe shabd yaad ho aae the
bolee  haan aisa kuchh likha to tha
lekin vah kya hota hai us par mainne adhik dhyaan nahin diya
vah yahee kshetr hai jo tum dekh rahee ho
mera isee ka opareshan hua tha
dev hairaan tha veena kee anabhigyata dekhakar
yaani  veena ne khulaasa chaaha
vah vaastav mein kuchh nahin samajh pa rahee thee
tab dev ne kaha  vah to tumhen main samajha deta hoon lekin kya ramesh bhaee ne yah sab nahin samajhaaya tumhen ya daidee ko
jaise dev ko veena kee is anabhigyata par sanshay tha
nahin dev tumase ab kis baat ka parada aisee kuchh baat nahin huee thee
veena ko dev ke shabd pahelee samaan lag rahe the
yah angrejee ka shabd jaise kisee gambheer bhaav ko chhipae tha
isaka matalab hee use nahin pata
vigyaapan ke is shabd par usane dhyaan hee nahin diya aur na hee use kisee ne isaka arth samajhaaya
yah shabd jaise usake jeevan mein koee bahut bada badalaav la sakata hai aisa sochakar use isaka arth na samajhana jaise apanee sabase badee bhool lagee
lekin is shabd ke sahaare to usane shaadee nahin kee thee
aaj phir yah shabd use itana rahasyamay kyon lagane laga
kuchh to aisa hai is shabd ka arth kuchh gambheer hee hai tabhee dev pareshaan ho utha hai use itana anjaan jaanakar
bhaarateey sanskrti  kis mod par hai
na matalab pata tha na jaanane kee koshish kee
soorat dekhee aur usee par mar mite
mujhe vishvaas nahin ho raha
unhonne to kaha tha doosare patr mein bhee likha hai aur hamaaree manganee ke din vah daidee ko baahar lekar bhee gae the
yahee kaaran tha ki mainne chaahate hue bhee tumase baat nahin kee
dev bhee duvidha mein phans gaya tha
mere daidee ne kuchh aisa nahin bataaya ghar mein
lekin kya yah seereeyas baat hai
main to is vishay mein kuchh nahin jaanatee
mujhe vistaar se batao
veena sab kuchh jaise abhee jaanane ko utsuk ho uthee thee
veena mujhe samajh nahin aa raha ki baat kahaan se shuroo karoon
lekin tum meree patnee ban chukee ho aur ab to tumase mera koee parada nahin hai
phir bhee baat kis tarah karoon ki tumhen yah sab baaten anuchit na lagen
dev ne apanee bhaavanaon ko sambhaalane kee cheshta karate hue kaha
use laga ki yadi vah abhee saaree baaten khul kar nahin bataega to na jaane veena par kya prabhaav padega
vah maanasik roop se ashaant ho jaegee
na jaane kya kar baithe ho sakata hai vah use chhodakar chalee jae
usane svayan ko aisee paristhiti sah sakane mein asamarth paaya
badee mushkil se to vah shaadee ko maana tha
ab shaadee ke baad aisee paristhiti saamane paakar vah svayan ko hee doshee samajh raha tha

bhaavanaon ko sambhaala usane aur bola  veena jaisa ki hamane vigyaapan mein likha tha ki mera opareshan hua tha bada opareshan hua tha aur shaadee ke lie usaka khulaasa karana jarooree tha iseelie meree jidd thee ki pooree baat bataee jae
lekin sach baat yah hai ki mujhase yahee kaha gaya ki tum logon ko sab bata diya gaya hai
tum itana to jaanatee ho ki meree shaadee kee saaree taiyaaree ramesh bhaee ne hee kee thee
maanbaaboojee ka in baaton se koee matalab nahin
ve to in baaton mein dakhal nahin dete
sach kahoon to unhen koee dakhal dene bhee nahin deta
yahaan jo kuchh bhee hota hai ham bhaeeyon kee aapasee raay se hota hai
dev dheeredheere sab gaanthe khol raha tha
veena kuchh saham see chukee thee lekin kuchh bolee nahin sunatee rahee dev ke shabdon ko  main apanee shaadee nahin karavaana chaahata tha
ek baar opareshan ho chuka hai phir koee pareshaanee ho jae kal ka kya pata lekin maan dabee jubaan se kahatee thee amit se baarabaar
ramesh va mohan bhaee saahab ko chitthee likhavaatee thee
pramod ke maadhyam se bhee mujh par jor dalavaatee thee
is baar jab ramesh bhaee chhuttee aae to unhonne mere doktar se jaakar baat kee
usane bhee apanee raay unake paksh mein dee thee
tabhee main maana
mainne apanee beetee jindagee mein itana ekaant bhoga hai itanee pareshaaniyaan sahee hain ki main bhee apana ghar basaane ko haamee bhar baitha aur jisaka parinaam hai mereetumhaaree shaadee
tab dev kuchh ruka usane veena kee or dekha
vah dev ko ekatak dekhe ja rahee thee
naee shaadee nae parivesh mein vah jitanee khush thee ab utanee saham see gaee thee
har pal usaka dil agyaat aashanka se bharata ja raha tha
agale pal kya khulaasa hoga use nahin maaloom tha
lekin sanskaaron se usaka man bahut komal tha
pati ke shabdon ke prati usake man mein shraddha thee
isee ke vasheebhoot huee bolee  mainne yah to nahin kaha aur na hee mainne socha ki aapane shaadee kyon kee main to is chot ke nishaan ko dekhakar aapase yahee poochh baithee ki yah kya hai
aap kah rahen ki aapaka mejar opareshan hua tha lekin abhee bhee mujhe samajh nahin aaya ki kis baat ka opareshan tha
aapako takaleeph kya thee main chhote se parivaar se aaee hoon
ghar mein koee beemaaree nahin sunee chhotee motee takaleephen hotee rahatee hain
shesh kuchh bhee nahin
parivesh hee aisa hai iseelie samajh nahin aaya
dev tab tak vichaaramagn hokar soch raha tha ki kya kuchh veena ko batae aur kya kuchh nahin batae
palang ke paas padee tebal par padee sigaret kee dibbee se ek sigaret nikaalakar usane sulaga lee
phir dheere se kahana shuroo kiya

pooree kahaanee to apanee phir kabhee sunaoonga lekin beemaaree ke baare mein sankshep mein itana hee kah sakata hoon ki peeechadee karate samay mujhe subah ke samay shauch ke saath khoon aane laga tha
doktar ne kaha bavaaseer hai jisaka ki chhotaasa opareshan hoga
usee ke lie mujhe aspataal mein bhartee kiya gaya
vahaan opareshan thiyetar mein kisee aur doktar ne mera nireekshan kiya
mere doktar se usane kaaphee bahas kee aur mera opareshan kainsil kar mera dubaara pareekshan kiya gaya
maans ka ek tukada boyopsee ke lie bheja gaya
usakee riport dekhakar mera doktar mujh se munh chhipaane laga
lekin pramod aur amit ne jaldee se doosare ek doktar se sampark kiya aur usane kaha ki yadi deree kee to koee ilaaj sambhav nahin hoga
vaastav mein vah kainsar kee shurooaat ke lakshan the
tab usane koee risk na lete hue mera rektam hee nikaal diya taaki lakshan jad se hee chale jaen aur ab usee kaaran main stool bajae praakrtik tareeke ke krtrim raaste se karata hoon
pahale to mujhe aage baig lagaana padata tha lekin ab sthiti doosaree hai
mere paas ek masheen hai
jisakee sahaayata se main subah savere pamp karake saaree saphaee kar leta hoon tatpashchaat chaibees ghante tak mujhe koee pareshaanee nahin hotee ise krtrim maladvaar ya kahate hain
doktaree shabd jisaka matalab aam aadamee ko samajh nahin aa sakata jab tak ki kisee doktar se na poochha jae ya phir shabd kosh mein dhoondha na jae
is ek shabd ne dev kee saaree pahachaan hee badal dee thee
veena ko apana sir ghoomata nazar aaya
yah kaise shabd the jo dev ke mukh se vah sun rahee thee
kya isee suhaagaraat kee kalpana kee thee usane kya shaadee ke baad yahee sapana poora hona tha usaka
usane apana sir thaam liya
aansoo aankhon se bahane shuroo ho gae
tab dev ne phir kaha  mainne jo baat tumhen bataee hai vah bilkul sach hai aur yah bhee sach hai ki ab mujhe koee khatara nahin aisa doktar ne bhee kaha hai aur mujhe bhee yahee mahasoos hota hai
opareshan hue do saal ho gae hain aur is dauraan mera vajan bees kilo badh chuka hai
pahale kee meree photo dekhogee to svayan hee andaaj laga logee
mujhe kuchh samajh nahin aa raha mainne aisee to kalpana bhee nahin kee thee
veena ne aansoo bahaate hue kaha
dev samajh gaya ki veena ke man ko thes pahunchee hai usakee sachchaee jaanakar
lekin vah bhee theek thee abhee to keval mantrochchaar dvaara hee ek rishte kee shurooaat huee thee
bhaavanaon kee thaah vah usakee kitanee laga paegee aisa nahin jaanata tha vah
koee usakee mitr to thee nahin puraanee jo usase kuchh doosaree tarah se anunayavinay kar sakata
use laga veena jyaada daree ya use kisee ne bahakaaya to vah use chhodakar chalee jaegee
kaash aisa na ho
usane socha yadi aisa ho gaya to vah bhee nahin jee paega
apanee haar to usane aaj tak nahin maanee hai
har mushkil ka usane saamana poore saahas se kiya hai
usakee jindagee mein kitane utaarachadhaav aae sabaka mukaabala kiya hai
risarch ke dauraan use ek baar laga tha ki sab tabaah ho gaya hai jab usake prophesar ne usake likhe sab risarch pepar apane naam se antaraashtreey patrikaon mein prakaashit karava lie the
tab use laga tha ki sapane bikhar gae hain usake
doosaree baar use tab apane sapane bikharate lage jab baarabaar koshish karane par bhee use naukaree nahin milee thee aur antim baar use tab laga tha jab usane svayan ka mrtyu se joojhate paaya tha
lekin saahas se sab kathinaeeyon ka mukaabala karane ke baad usane vijay ko apane saamane paaya tha
in kshanon se kuchh samay pahale tak vah svayan ko sabase bhaagyashaalee purush maan raha tha
lekin ab ab use koee raasta nahin sujhaee de raha tha ki jisakee madad se vah veena ka vishvaas jeet le
baat aisee thee ki vishvaas jeetane ke lie chand ghanto ka samay tha keval chand ghanto ka
kyonki subah kamare se nikalate hee yadi veena koee nirnay le baithee tab tab dev ka kya hoga
